Plot: What on Earth has Doze Niu done wrong? Doze runs into many problems ranging from relationship woes to professional challenges as he tries to secure funding for what he thinks will be the next mockumentary blockbuster.
Title: What on Earth Have I Done Wrong?!
Writer: Doze Niu (screenplay), Tsung-han Tsai (screenplay), Li-ting Tseng (screenplay)
Actors: Doze Niu, Janine Chun-Ning Chang, Huan-Ru Ke, Hsi-Sheng Chen
